text: Samuel Louis Nistico (February 6, 1924 â€“ January 17, 2021), better known as Sammy Nestico, was an American composer and arranger. Nestico was best known for his arrangements for the Count Basie orchestra. Nestico died on January 17, 2021 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American composers Category:Musicians from Pittsburgh Category:American jazz musicians
title: Sammy Nestico
